entry.title: Linux配置SSH Key到GitHub
entry.content:
1.生成SSH Key

首先检查下本机是否已经安装了SSH，在终端输入ssh即可：







如果没有安装进行yum安装

<span class="hljs-comment"># yum -y install openssh-clients</span>`</pre>###### 接下来就是生成ssh key了，输入ssh-keygen -t rsa，然后连续按回车键三次（注意：千万不要输入密码！）。<div class="image-package"><div class="image-container" style="max-width: 536px; max-height: 330px; background-color: transparent;"><div class="image-container-fill" style="padding-bottom: 61.57%;"></div><div class="image-view" data-width="536" data-height="330">![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2743275-7398d3f9f1eef72c.png)</div></div><div class="image-caption"></div></div>id_rsa.pub为公钥，id_rsa为私钥，它们都是隐藏文件。那么如何查看它们的内容呢？只需要继续执行以下两条命令即可。<pre class="hljs bash">`<span class="hljs-comment"># cd .ssh/</span><span class="hljs-comment"># cat id_rsa.pub</span>`</pre><div class="image-package"><div class="image-container" style="max-width: 700px; max-height: 66px; background-color: transparent;"><div class="image-container-fill" style="padding-bottom: 5.779999999999999%;"></div><div class="image-view" data-width="1142" data-height="66">![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2743275-2c142d50f896e48b.png)</div></div><div class="image-caption"></div></div>#### 2.添加SSH Key到GitHub上<div class="image-package"><div class="image-container" style="max-width: 260px; max-height: 280px; background-color: transparent;"><div class="image-container-fill" style="padding-bottom: 107.69%;"></div><div class="image-view" data-width="260" data-height="280">![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2743275-062ea02946eb9af5.png)</div></div><div class="image-caption"></div></div>接着执行下面操作：<div class="image-package"><div class="image-container" style="max-width: 700px; max-height: 440px; background-color: transparent;"><div class="image-container-fill" style="padding-bottom: 41.28%;"></div><div class="image-view" data-width="1066" data-height="440">![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2743275-d2a6a8697131e8d7.png)</div></div><div class="image-caption"></div></div>点击New SSH Key按钮后进行Key的填写操作，完成SSH Key的添加。如下图：<div class="image-package"><div class="image-container" style="max-width: 700px; max-height: 664px; background-color: transparent;"><div class="image-container-fill" style="padding-bottom: 58.4%;"></div><div class="image-view" data-width="1137" data-height="664">![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2743275-1a8f4cd790d9d667.png)</div></div><div class="image-caption"></div></div><div class="image-package"><div class="image-container" style="max-width: 700px; max-height: 630px; background-color: transparent;"><div class="image-container-fill" style="padding-bottom: 40.23%;"></div><div class="image-view" data-width="1566" data-height="630">![](//upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/2743275-cdbdf7fd81c8ac11.png)</div></div><div class="image-caption"></div></div>添加SSH Key成功之后，继续输入命令进行测试。<pre class="hljs ruby">`<span class="hljs-comment"># ssh -T git<span class="hljs-doctag">@github</span>.com</span>






出现上图结果则说明添加SSH Key成功。
entry.summary:
1.生成SSH Key

首先检查下本机是否已经安装了SSH，在终端输入ssh即可：
